EXTRACTED VALUE: Marcus Camby was benched after playing just under three minutes of the first half of Friday's game.
Jermaine O'Neal (knee), who is with the team for Sunday's game in New Jersey, will participate in an on-court workout tomorrow.
The Pistons may soon invite another young big man to training camp, though they already have 15 players under contract.
Derek Fisher had 14 points, three assists and a 3-pointer on 5-of-6 shooting Sunday.
Ray Allen had season-high 25 points, three 3-pointers, three rebounds, three assists and two steals in Friday's win.
